alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:37PM EDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Indiana...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .Rain that fell overnight combined with the additional rainfall expected into tonight will result in rises on the Ohio River. The river is forecast to go over flood stage at six locations. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Monday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday evening and continue rising to a crest of 42.3 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
